summary: WE PURCHASED A TEMP AIR THERMAL SYSTEM 5/4/2017 VIN#[XXX]. THE TRAILER PORTION IS BUILT BY REDNECK TRAILERS WITH DEXTER AXLES 121154571 MODEL#11. ON 12/6/19 PASSENGER WHEEL AND HUB CAME OFF. THIS UNIT HAS TANDEM AXLES RATED AT 4000LBS EACH WITH GVWR OF 8000LBS. ON 4/26/18 DRIVERS SIDE WHEEL AND HUB CAME OFF WHILE DRIVING. WE NOTIFIED TEMP AIR INC. AND THEY SENT US A NEW DEXTER AXLE ON 5/4/2018.    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
